html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-01532024-02-19PCH
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectOrder Approving a Lease Agreement between the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation and Zynga Game Canada Ltd
PrecisOrder approving that the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION enter into a lease agreement with Zynga Game Canada Ltd. for the lease of a portion of the real property located at 250 Front Street West in Toronto, Ontario, for a term of two years, four months, and one day, with the option to renew the lease for another period of three years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving that the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION enter into a lease agreement with Zynga Game Canada Ltd. for the lease of a portion of the real property located at 250 Front Street West in Toronto, Ontario, for a term of two years, four months, and one day, with the option to renew the lease for another period of three years.
